    #2018SDB

    Jeff’s research was recognized with the Hilde Mangold Postdoctoral Presentation Award at the 77th Annual SDB Meeting in Portland, OR. The award was generously sponsored by Developmental Dynamics and Chroma.

    Thanks to the organizers for putting together a fantastic meeting. The quality of the science was outstanding and SDB has done a great job of fostering the dev bio community! The lab looks forward to participating in many future SDB meetings.

    Updated: July 24, 2018
